name: Senior Activities
description: Italian Community Services hosts an array of activities tailored to the seniors of their community. From their weekly Wednesday luncheons to rotating Thursday events featuring bingo, movies, and exciting field trips around San Francisco, they aim to foster a sense of connection as they embrace the spirit of togetherness.
fullDescription: Italian Community Services hosts an array of activities tailored to the seniors of their community. From their weekly Wednesday luncheons to rotating Thursday events featuring bingo, movies, and exciting field trips around San Francisco, they aim to foster a sense of connection as they embrace the spirit of togetherness.
whatTheyOffer: Italian Community Services hosts an array of activities tailored to the seniors of their community. From their weekly Wednesday luncheons to rotating Thursday events featuring bingo, movies, and exciting field trips around San Francisco, they aim to foster a sense of connection as they embrace the spirit of togetherness.
howToGetIt: Please RSVP for events online or by calling our office at (415) 362-6423 ext. 10 by the Friday before the event. Event calendar: https://www.italiancs.org/events
keywords: congregate meals for seniors and people with disabilities
